actions.command: sh -c '[[ $SWAYNC_TOGGLE_STATE == true ]] && pactl set-sink-port @DEFAULT_SINK@ analog-output-headphones || pactl set-sink-port @DEFAULT_SINK@ analog-output-speaker'
actions.update-command: sh -c 'pactl list sinks | grep -q "Active Port: analog-output-headphones" && echo true || echo false'

actions.command: sh -c '[[ $SWAYNC_TOGGLE_STATE == true ]] && pactl set-sink-mute @DEFAULT_SINK@ 1 || pactl set-sink-mute @DEFAULT_SINK@ 0'
actions.update-command: sh -c 'pactl get-sink-mute @DEFAULT_SINK@ | grep -q "yes" && echo true || echo false'

actions.command: sh -c '[[ $SWAYNC_TOGGLE_STATE == true ]] && nmcli radio wifi on || nmcli radio wifi off'
actions.update-command: sh -c '[[ $(nmcli radio wifi) == "enabled" ]] && echo true || echo false'

actions.command:
sh -c 'systemctl is-active --quiet bluetooth.service && ( [[ $SWAYNC_TOGGLE_STATE == true ]] && echo -e "power on
quit" | bluetoothctl || echo -e "power off
quit" | bluetoothctl ) || (echo false && notify-send -t 1999 "Bluetooth.service Inactive" "Try running systemctl start bluetooh.service") '
actions.update-command: sh -c 'systemctl is-active --quiet bluetooth.service && (bluetoothctl show | grep -q "Powered: yes" && echo true || echo false) || echo false'

actions.command: sh -c '[[ $SWAYNC_TOGGLE_STATE == true ]] && (hypridle & notify-send -t 2000 "Hypridle Started") || (killall hypridle && notify-send -t 1999 "Hypridle Stopped")'
actions.update-command: sh -c 'pgrep hypridle && echo true || echo false'

actions.command: sh -c '[[ $SWAYNC_TOGGLE_STATE == true ]] && hyprshade auto || hyprshade off'
actions.update-command: sh -c '[[ $(hyprshade current) ]] && echo true || echo false'
